title: Wales vs Uruguay, Rugby World Cup 2019: What time is kick-off tomorrow, what TV channel is it on and what is our prediction?
text:
What is it?

Wales vs Uruguay face each other in both sides' final Rugby World Cup pool fixture. Wales have already secured a place in the quarter-finals but will be attempting to guarantee themselves first position with a win. Uruguay produced one of the surprises of the tournament when they beat Fiji but have struggled to match that intensity since.

When is it?

Sunday October 13, in Kumamoto Stadium, Kumamoto City.

What time is kick-off?

9.15 (BST), 17.15 local time.

What TV channel is it on?

This match is on ITV. You can also follow this game right here with Telegraph Sport.
